movies.title: Inception
movies.description: Inception is a 2010 science fiction action film written and directed by Christopher Nolan.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The Godfather is a 1972 American crime film directed by Francis Ford Coppola.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: The Shawshank Redemption is a 1994 American drama film written and directed by Frank Darabont.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: The Matrix is a 1999 science fiction action film written and directed by the Wachowskis.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: The Fellowship of the Ring is a 2001 epic fantasy adventure film directed by Peter Jackson.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.description: Goodfellas is a 1990 American crime film directed by Martin Scorsese.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: Gladiator is a 2000 epic historical drama film directed by Ridley Scott.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.description: Avatar is a 2009 American epic science fiction film directed, written, produced, and co-edited by James Cameron.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: Interstellar is a 2014 epic science fiction film directed by Christopher Nolan.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.description: The Departed is a 2006 American crime film directed by Martin Scorsese.

movies.title: The Godfather: Part II
movies.description: The Godfather: Part II is a 1974 American crime film directed by Francis Ford Coppola.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: The Lion King is a 1994 American animated musical drama film produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation and released by Walt Disney Pictures.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.description: The Dark Knight Rises is a 2012 superhero film directed by Christopher Nolan.

movies.title: 3 Idiots
movies.description: 3 Idiots is a 2009 Indian coming-of-age comedy-drama film directed by Rajkumar Hirani.

movies.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
movies.description: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge is a 1995 Indian romance film directed by Aditya Chopra.

movies.title: Lagaan
movies.description: Lagaan is a 2001 Indian epic sports-drama film directed by Ashutosh Gowariker.

movies.title: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham
movies.description: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham is a 2001 Indian family drama film written and directed by Karan Johar.

movies.title: Andhadhun
movies.description: Andhadhun is a 2018 Indian black comedy crime thriller film directed by Sriram Raghavan.

movies.title: Gully Boy
movies.description: Gully Boy is a 2019 Indian Hindi-language musical drama film directed by Zoya Akhtar.

movies.title: PK
movies.description: PK is a 2014 Indian satirical comedy-drama film directed by Rajkumar Hirani.

movies.title: Queen
movies.description: Queen is a 2013 Indian comedy-drama film directed by Vikas Bahl.

movies.title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
movies.description: Bajrangi Bhaijaan is a 2015 Indian Hindi-language drama film directed by Kabir Khan.

movies.title: Dangal
movies.description: Dangal is a 2016 Indian Hindi-language sports film directed by Nitesh Tiwari.

movies.title: Baahubali: The Beginning
movies.description: Baahubali: The Beginning is an epic historical fiction film directed by S.S. Rajamouli. It follows the story of Shiva, a young man who learns about his heritage and embarks on a quest to reclaim the throne of his kingdom.

movies.title: Rangasthalam
movies.description: Rangasthalam is a period action drama directed by Sukumar. It tells the story of Chitti Babu, a partially deaf man, who becomes involved in a political rivalry in his village.

movies.title: KGF: Chapter 1
movies.description: KGF: Chapter 1 is a Kannada-language action film directed by Prashanth Neel. It follows the rise of Rocky, a gangster, in the gold mines of Kolar, Karnataka.

movies.title: Vikram Vedha
movies.description: Vikram Vedha is a crime thriller directed by Pushkar-Gayathri. It revolves around the cat-and-mouse game between a righteous police officer, Vikram, and a notorious gangster, Vedha.

movies.title: Lucia
movies.description: Lucia is a Kannada-language psychological thriller directed by Pawan Kumar. It intertwines the stories of a lucid dreamer and a struggling actor.

movies.title: Super Deluxe
movies.description: Super Deluxe is a Tamil-language black comedy-drama directed by Thiagarajan Kumararaja. It follows the interconnected lives of several characters over the course of a day.

movies.title: Bangalore Days
movies.description: Bangalore Days is a Malayalam-language romantic drama directed by Anjali Menon. It follows the lives of three cousins who move to Bangalore and explores their relationships and aspirations.

movies.title: Arjun Reddy
movies.description: Arjun Reddy is a Telugu-language romantic drama directed by Sandeep Reddy Vanga. It tells the story of a brilliant but self-destructive surgeon and his tumultuous relationship with his girlfriend.

movies.title: Sacred Games
movies.description: A link in their pasts leads an honest cop to a fugitive gang boss, whose cryptic warning spurs the officer on a quest to save Mumbai from cataclysm.

movies.title: Mirzapur S2
movies.description: A shocking incident at a wedding procession ignites a series of events entangling the lives of two families in the lawless city of Mirzapur.

movies.title: Mirzapur S1
movies.description: Mirzapur is a gripping crime thriller series set in the heartland of India, where power, politics, and revenge collide. The story revolves around the lawless town of Mirzapur, ruled by mafia dons and corrupt politicians, as two brothers become entangled in the web of violence and ambition.

movies.title: Delhi Crime
movies.description: Based on the 2012 Nirbhaya case, Delhi Crime follows the Delhi Police investigation into the finding of the men who perpetrated this crime.

movies.title: The Family Man
movies.description: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

movies.title: Made in Heaven
movies.description: Made In Heaven chronicles the lives of Tara and Karan, two wedding planners in Delhi. India is a potent blend of old and new.

movies.title: Panchayat
movies.description: A comedy-drama, which captures the journey of an engineering graduate Abhishek, who for lack of a better job option joins as secretary of a Panchayat office in a remote village of Uttar Pradesh.

movies.title: Special OPS
movies.description: The series follows Himmat Singh of Research and Analysis Wing who draws similar patterns in terrorist attacks and is convinced a single person is behind all the attacks. His task force team of five agents living in various parts of the world aim to catch the mastermind.

movies.title: Paatal Lok
movies.description: A down and out cop lands the case of a lifetime when four suspects are nabbed in the assassination attempt of a journalist. The pursuit of it leads him to 'Paatal Lok', and to shocking discoveries in the past of the four suspects.

movies.title: Aarya
movies.description: When her world suddenly turns upside down, will Aarya become the very thing she hated?How far will she go to survive and protect her family?

movies.title: Scam 1992
movies.description: Set in 1980's and 90's Bombay, it follows the life of Harshad Mehta, a stockbroker who took the stock market to dizzying heights and his catastrophic downfall.

movies.title: Scam 2003
movies.description: Born in Khanapur in Karnataka, Telgi became the mastermind behind one of the most ingenious schemes in Indian history that spread across multiple states and shook the entire country.

movies.title: Farzi
movies.description: An artist who gets pulled into the murky high stakes of a con job and a fiery task force officer on the mission to rid the country of his menaces in a fast-paced, edgy one-of-a-kind thriller.

movies.title: The Ghazi Attack
movies.description: Set in 1971, during the Indo-Pakistani War, the film depicts the true events surrounding the classified operation conducted by the Indian Navy against the Pakistani submarine Ghazi, which aimed to destroy INS Vikrant.

movies.title: IB71
movies.description: Set in the backdrop of the 1971 Indo-Pak war, IB71 chronicles the untold story of a covert operation led by India's Intelligence Bureau to infiltrate enemy lines and gather crucial information that could change the course of the war.

movies.title: Sam Bahadur
movies.description: Sam Bahadur is a riveting biographical film that chronicles the remarkable life of Sam Manekshaw, one of India's most celebrated military leaders. Sam Manekshaw is one of the most decorated officers in the Indian army, serving for over four decades and fighting in five wars. He is the first army officer to be promoted to the rank of Field Marshal.

movies.title: Dhamaal
movies.description: Dhamaal is a hilarious comedy film that follows the misadventures of four friends who embark on a quest to find a hidden treasure. Their journey is filled with slapstick humor, unexpected twists, and madcap escapades.

movies.title: Double Dhamaal
movies.description: Double Dhamaal is a rib-tickling sequel to the hit comedy 'Dhamaal.' This time, the four friends find themselves in even crazier situations as they try to outsmart a corrupt businessman and his cronies. Packed with double the laughter, double the fun, and double the dhamaal!

movies.title: Total Dhamaal
movies.description: Total Dhamaal is a roller-coaster ride of comedy, action, and adventure. When a group of eccentric individuals set out on a treasure hunt, they encounter wild animals, treacherous terrains, and each other's eccentricities. With non-stop laughs and heart-pounding thrills, it's total dhamaal all the way!
